```{r setup}
library(eulerr)
```

eulerr features multiples loss functions.

```{r}
library(eulerr)

list_euler <- c(
  "agc" = 9,
  "camk" = 17,
  "cmgc" = 16,
  "tk" = 16,
  "tkl" = 23,
  "agc&camk" = 1,
  "camk&tk" = 1,
  "tk&tkl" = 1,
  "camk&cmgc&tkl" = 1,
  "camk&tk&tkl" = 2,
  "agc&camk&tk&tkl" = 1,
  "camk&cmgc&tk&tkl" = 3,
  "agc&camk&cmgc&tk&tkl" = 1
)
```
